summary: Diff implements a new hospital-style theme via global CSS variables and Tailwind tokens, and restyles the SiteHeader/SiteFooter plus HomePage layout/styling. Some acceptance criteria (e.g., mobile Google search link, presence of all required Home sections) cannot be fully verified due to truncation, but no clear requirement gaps are evidenced in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer adds dynamic app identifier (window.location.hostname) to build a tracking/UTM query parameter for the caffeine.ai link.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires that the caffeine.ai attribution link remains; adding dynamic tracking parameters is an unrequested behavior change (even if minor).
